channel.title: How do make 'follow' work in the Context Menu?
channel.description:
Guys, I'm working with a server here, and they give the code so that i can have the option to follow someone, but when I right click them and click 'follow' (keep in mind, it won't even highlight, which I wouldn't mind figuring out how too). Anyways, when I click 'follow' it will say in the chat box below "you are following (playername)" but I wont' be following them. Thanks, I would love it if you could help.
PS - i'm using a 317 server.

item.title: How do make 'follow' work in the Context Menu?
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Guys, I’m working with a server here, and they give the code so that i can have the option to follow someone, but when I right click them and click ‘follow’ (keep in mind, it won’t even highlight, which I wouldn’t mind figuring out how too). Anyways, when I click ‘follow’ it will say in the chat box below “you are following (playername)” but I wont’ be following them. Thanks, I would love it if you could help.

PS - i’m using a 317 server.
